newsitem.title: FINLAND: HUHTAMAKI SAYS TO ANNOUNCE RESTRUCTURING.
newsitem.headline: HUHTAMAKI SAYS TO ANNOUNCE RESTRUCTURING.

text.p: Finnish confectionery and packaging group Huhtamaki Oy said in a statement on Friday it will announce at a 1600/1300 GMTR news conference a significant corporate restructuring.
Trade in Huhtamaki shares was earlier suspended on the Helsinki bourse at the company's own request.
"Huhtamaki will announce ... a significant corporate restructuring," Huhtamaki said in the statement. It did not elaborate, but said CEO Timo Peltola will chair the news conference.
